short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clock in and out of Miday directly from Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Time Tracking for Miday Users. Clock in and out of your Miday account's clients and tasks. 

This extension is for Miday users. 

What is Miday?
Miday is a time tracking and invoicing tool built for freelancers.
